title: Let's do the sin: Creating a reverse proxy in Python :)
shortDescription: If you ever insists to build a http reverse proxy in Python, I got some handy code snippets (as I also insisted for the same, long back)
longDescription: If you ever plans to create a HTTP/WS reverse proxy, Of course python is not the answer. But if you insists so, I got some handy code snippets (as I also insisted for the same, long back)
